message: Let's split it evenly, Bob. Fair is fair, right?
You're being too generous, Alice. I'll take the majority this time.
Okay, Bob, I'll compromise a bit.  But I'm not going to let you take all the money!
You're getting desperate, Alice. Time to make a serious offer.
Bob, we're getting closer to the end. I'm still willing to negotiate, but I won't be giving you everything!
You're running out of time, Alice. This is my best offer.
Bob, I'm making a final stand.  I won't let you take everything, but I'm willing to take a smaller share to avoid getting nothing at all.
You're getting desperate, Alice. This is my final offer. Take it or leave it.
